Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the problem by stating that it is "not possible" for some Wisconsin residents to watch Packers games, when in reality it only happens several times per season.
Understate: The claim understates the problem by not acknowledging that there are only a few instances where residents in "orphan counties" are unable to watch Packers games.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or data to support the statement that some Wisconsin residents are "forced to watch Viking games."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all Wisconsin residents are Packers fans and would prefer to watch Packers games over Viking games.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why some Wisconsin residents may be watching Viking games, such as personal preferences or the availability of different television networks in certain areas.
